overview:
I’m a Dutch/American national with a proven track record in business development, having worked in multicultural teams on an international level. Before joining blueKiwi, I worked at Criteo as their Sales Director for Europe, responsible for developing their sales strategy, growing the client base and hiring and training a team of Account Managers. Prior to that, I was hired by Mappy.com in order to develop the company’s B2B business by selling white-label mapping and geo-localization solutions to Retailers around Europe.

Before moving to Paris, I spent two years in Tokyo as a Consultant in one of Japan’s largest Executive Recruitment firms, after which I moved to Hong Kong and then to London for Easylink, a global provider of on-demand messaging and supply chain services, where I was responsible for managing Fortune 100 accounts especially in the field of banking, insurance and retail over a period of four years.
